mapper.insert: insert into post (p_no, p_id, p_photo, p_content, p_filter) values (post_pno_seq.nextval, #{p_id}, #{p_photo}, #{p_content}, #{p_filter})
mapper.update: update post set p_replycnt=p_replycnt+1 where p_no=#{r_pno}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(r_no, r_pno, r_id, r_content, r_ref, r_lev, r_seq) values(reply_rno_seq.nextval, #{r_pno}, #{r_id}, #{r_content}, reply_rno_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select * from reply where r_pno=#{r_pno} order by r_no desc
